tika-vin05t16:1_1: Duvidhaṁ sahaseyyakanti ‘‘yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ (pāci. 49).
tika-vin05t16:1_2: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiya’’nti (pāci.
tika-vin05t16:1_3: 56) evaṁ vuttaṁ sahaseyyasikkhāpadadvayaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Tatrāyaṁ vinicchayo (pāci. aṭṭha.
tika-vin05t16:1_4: 50-51) – anupasampannena saddhiṁ tiṇṇaṁ rattīnaṁ upari catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye sabbacchannasabbaparicchanne yebhuyyacchannayebhuyyaparicchanne vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā ekakkhaṇe vā nipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_5: Tattha chadanaṁ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā yena kenaci paricchannampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_6: Yaṁ senāsanaṁ upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paricchannaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_8: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṁ gahetvā vācuggatavasena ‘‘sabbacchannaṁ nāma pañcahi chadanehi channa’’nti vuttaṁ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_9: atha kho dussakuṭiyaṁ sayantassapi na sakkā anāpatti kātuṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_10: tasmā yaṁ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṁ idha chadanañca paricchannañca veditabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_11: Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi sahaseyyā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin05t16:1_12: tasmā yaṁ senāsanaṁ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāvachadanaṁ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenapi parikkhittaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_14: Chadanaṁ anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittampi sabbaparicchannameva.
tika-vin05t16:1_15: Yassa pana upari bahutaraṁ ṭhānaṁ channaṁ, appaṁ acchannaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_16: samantato vā bahutaraṁ parikkhittaṁ, appaṁ aparikkhittaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:2_0: Iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti, satagabbhaṁ vā catusālaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:2_2: Evarūpe senāsane anupasampannena saddhiṁ catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye nipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:2_3: Sace pana sambahulā sāmaṇerā, eko bhikkhu, sāmaṇeragaṇanāya pācittiyā.
tika-vin05t16:2_6: bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa āpatti. Sace sambahulā bhikkhū, eko sāmaṇero,
tika-vin05t16:3_2: Yo hi ekasmiṁ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti,
tika-vin05t16:3_4: Yopi ekasmiṁyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t16:3_5: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t16:3_6: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṁ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṁ kappeti,
tika-vin05t16:4_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma ‘‘bhikkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā’’ti vacanato antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenapi saddhiṁ hoti,
tika-vin05t16:4_1: tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno vasanasenāsane ekūpacāraṭṭhāne sayati, sahaseyyāva hoti.
tika-vin05t16:4_2: Yadi pana thambhānaṁ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṁ asambaddhabhittikassa bhittiyā upariṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t16:4_3: heṭṭhāpāsāde sayitabhikkhussa anāpatti. Sace chadane chiddaṁ hoti,
tika-vin05t16:4_4: tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati,
tika-vin05t16:4_7: Sace antopāsādeneva ārohitvā sabbatalāni paribhuñjanti, ekūpacārāni honti,
tika-vin05t16:4_9: sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsane sayitassa tulāvāḷasaghāṭādīsu kapotādayo sayanti, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t16:4_11: Parimaṇḍalaṁ vā caturassaṁ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṁ cepi senāsanaṁ hoti,
tika-vin05t16:4_12: tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṁ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre sabbagabbhepi pavisanti,
tika-vin05t16:4_13: ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṁ āpatti. Sace sapamukhā gabbhā honti, pamukhañca upari acchannaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:4_14: pamukhe sayito gabbhe sayitānaṁ āpattiṁ na karoti.
tika-vin05t16:4_16: tatra sayito sabbesaṁ āpattiṁ karoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t16:5_1: Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatusālasannivesā mahāpāsādā ekasmiṁ okāse pāde dhovitvā paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṁ,
tika-vin05t16:5_3: Sace tasmiṁ tasmiṁ ṭhāne upacāraṁ paricchinditvā katā honti, ekūpacāraṭṭhāneyeva āpatti.
tika-vin05t16:5_4: Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṁ karonti,
tika-vin05t16:5_5: ekena dvārena pavisitvā ekasmiṁ paricchede anupasampanno sayati, ekasmiṁ bhikkhu, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t16:5_8: Na hi chiddena gehaṁ ekūpacāraṁ nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t16:5_9: Sace pākāramajjhe chinditvā dvāraṁ yojenti, ekūpacāratāya āpatti.
tika-vin05t16:5_10: Taṁ dvāraṁ kavāṭena pidahitvā sayanti, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t16:5_11: Na hi dvārapidahanena gehaṁ nānūpacāraṁ nāma hoti, dvāraṁ vā advāraṁ.
tika-vin05t16:5_12: Kavāṭañhi saṁvaraṇavivaraṇehi yathāsukhaṁ vaḷañjanatthāya kataṁ, na vaḷañjupacchedanatthāya.
tika-vin05t16:5_13: Sace taṁ dvāraṁ puna iṭṭhakāhi pidahanti, advāraṁ hoti,
tika-vin05t16:5_15: Dīghapamukhaṁ cetiyagharaṁ hoti, ekaṁ kavāṭaṁ anto, ekaṁ bahi,
tika-vin05t16:5_16: dvinnaṁ kavāṭānaṁ antare anupasampanno antocetiyaghare sayantassa āpattiṁ karoti ekūpacārattā.
tika-vin05t16:6_0: Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – senāsanaṁ khuddakaṁ vā hotu mahantaṁ vā,
tika-vin05t16:6_1: aññena saddhiṁ sambandhaṁ vā asambandhaṁ vā,
tika-vin05t16:6_2: dīghaṁ vā vaṭṭaṁ vā caturassaṁ vā,
tika-vin05t16:6_3: ekabhūmikaṁ vā anekabhūmikaṁ vā, yaṁ yaṁ ekūpacāraṁ,
tika-vin05t16:6_5: Ettha ca yena kenaci paṭicchadanena sabbacchanne sabbaparicchanne pācittiyaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:6_17: yebhuyyenaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭanti pañca dukkaṭāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t16:6_24: Ayañhettha viseso – anupasampannena saddhiṁ nipajjantassa catutthadivase āpatti,
tika-vin05t16:6_26: Yakkhipetīhi pana dissamānakarūpāhi tiracchānagatitthiyā ca methunadhammavatthubhūtāya eva dukkaṭaṁ, sesāhi anāpatti.
